name: Tortellini
steps: Meat or Cheese Tortellini Salt and Pepper
Heavy Whipping Cream (usually get everything from Costco)
Boil tortellini according to package. After the tortellini is cooked carefully put into a 9x13 pan. Pour
whipping cream over pasta, covering it all. Add a little salt and pepper. Layer parmensan cheese over entire
top. Cover with foil and and cook at 350 for 30 minutes and then remove foil and cook for 10 more minutes.
